<thinking>The user requested information for three cards. The first card (111.111.111.100) returned valid data, but the other two (111.111.111.101 and 111.111.111.102) encountered "client session running" errors. 

Key considerations:
1. CARD service health check required before retrying
2. Must verify service status per protocol
3. Previous health checks showed HEALTHY but transient errors occurred

Next step: Check CARD service health to determine if system issues exist before retrying failed requests.</thinking>
